verses.text: \w My|strong="H1245"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1245"\w* garden, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* bed \w of|strong="H0802"\w* aromatical spices, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* feed \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* gardens, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* gather lilies.

I \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H3381"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H3381"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H3381"\w*, who feedeth among \w the|strong="H3381"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.

Thou art beautiful, \w O|strong="H1730"\w* \w my|strong="H0589"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*, sweet \w and|strong="H1730"\w* comely \w as|strong="H0589"\w* Jerusalem: terrible \w as|strong="H0589"\w* an army set in array.

Turn away thy eyes \w from|strong="H3389"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w*, \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* made \w me|strong="H0859"\w* flee away. Thy hair \w is|strong="H3389"\w* \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w a|strong="H3389"\w* flock \w of|strong="H3303"\w* goats, \w that|strong="H3389"\w* appear \w from|strong="H3389"\w* Galaad.

Thy teeth \w as|strong="H1992"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* sheep, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w come|strong="H5437"\w* \w up|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* washing, \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* twins, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w none|strong="H4480"\w* barren \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

Thy cheeks \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bark \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* pomegranate, beside what \w is|strong="H0369"\w* hidden within thee.
There are threescore queens, \w and|strong="H7416"\w* fourscore concubines, \w and|strong="H7416"\w* young maidens without number.

\w One|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* my dove, my perfect \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w but|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w*, she \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0369"\w* only \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* her mother, \w the|strong="H0369"\w* chosen \w of|strong="H4557"\w* her \w that|strong="H0369"\w* bore her. \w The|strong="H0369"\w* daughters saw her, \w and|strong="H6370"\w* declared her most blessed: \w the|strong="H0369"\w* \w queens|strong="H4436"\w* \w and|strong="H6370"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, \w and|strong="H6370"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* praised her.

\w Who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* cometh \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* morning rising, fair \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* moon, \w bright|strong="H1249"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* sun, terrible \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* army set \w in|strong="H7200"\w* array?

I went \w down|strong="H8259"\w* \w into|strong="H7837"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* garden \w of|strong="H3303"\w* nuts, \w to|strong="H7837"\w* see \w the|strong="H3644"\w* fruits \w of|strong="H3303"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* valleys, \w and|strong="H3303"\w* \w to|strong="H7837"\w* \w look|strong="H8259"\w* \w if|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* vineyard had flourished, \w and|strong="H3303"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* pomegranates budded.
\w I|strong="H7200"\w* knew not: \w my|strong="H7200"\w* soul troubled \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* chariots \w of|strong="H1612"\w* Aminadab.
Return, return, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Sulamitess: return, return \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* thee.
